ui:msg.description: LinguaeLive is like having a modern-day pen pal, an expert coach, and student tutor in one.

ui:msg.description: You will exchange one time unit of communication in the language that you are learning (your 'target language') for an equal unit in the language in which you are expert (your 'expert language').

div.ui:msg: You will exchange one time unit of communication in the language that you are learning (your 'target language') for an equal unit in the language in which you are expert (your 'expert language').

ui:msg.description: Your instructor will guide you on the topics to discuss. Your instructor will tell you whether you need to document the time that you communicated using the timing buttons on the Session Control Panel.

ui:msg.description: If your instructor agrees, you may choose the topic when you are speaking in your target language. In exchange, your LinguaeLive partner(s) decides the topic when you are speaking in your expert language.
